scenes.text: Welcome to Cardiff University Psychology Society! We are an academic and social-minded society that aims to broaden the scope of what Psychology students (or anyone else interested in finding out more about psychology) see possible out of their time at university - both in terms of academia and connecting with others!
We don't have a specific day, but specific date and times for socials we run can be found on our SU page and our social media.
Our membership is Â£3.00 for the year!
We run a range of frequent socials including Career events, Educational talks, Staff-student events, Coffee and Cake mornings, Movie nights, End of year Psychology ball, and Conference visits.
